title: Curry-Spiced Butternut Squash Soup
ingredients: ['190g uncooked wild rice', '700ml water', '1.1kg butternut squash, peeled, seeded and cubed', '600ml chicken stock', '125ml orange juice', '30g butter', '1 medium onion, chopped', '1 clove garlic, finely chopped', '1 1/2 teaspoons curry powder', '1 1/4 teaspoons salt', '1/2 teaspoon ground black pepper']
